abstract: With the healthcare mega-merger party in full swing, others may show up to take part in the festivities.
lead_paragraph: With the healthcare mega-merger party in full swing, others may show up to take part in the festivities.

headline.main: After Merck Deal, Rivals May Seek to Fill Their Dance Cards

abstract: Two pharmaceutical companies, with headquarters a half-hour’s drive apart on Interstate 78, form the backbone of the New Jersey communities they call home. Merck & Company, in Whitehouse Station, and Schering-Plough, in Kenilworth 34 miles to the east, provide jobs, tax revenue and a sense of identity in a state that some call America’s medicine cabinet.
lead_paragraph: Two pharmaceutical companies, with headquarters a half-hour’s drive apart on Interstate 78, form the backbone of the New Jersey communities they call home. Merck & Company, in Whitehouse Station, and Schering-Plough, in Kenilworth 34 miles to the east, provide jobs, tax revenue and a sense of identity in a state that some call America’s medicine cabinet.

headline.main: New Jersey Towns Worry About Merger’s Consequences

abstract: If Johnson & Johnson — or anyone else, for that matter — is thinking about making a play for Schering-Plough, here’s a number worth considering: $1.25 billion.
lead_paragraph: If Johnson & Johnson — or anyone else, for that matter — is thinking about making a play for Schering-Plough, here’s a number worth considering: $1.25 billion.

headline.main: For Merck and Schering, Goodbye Could Cost $1.25 Billion
